text: Mozhet byt', vy zhelayete prosit' u svoyego proroka takiye zhe znameniya, kak raneye prosili syny Israila u Musy, zhelaya videt' Allakha svoimi sobstvennymi glazami? Vasha pros'ba k Mukhammadu skryvayet vashe neveriye tak zhe, kak i pros'ba synov Israila v te vremena skryvala neveriye. Kto zamenyayet veru neveriyem i predpochitayet upryamstvo podchineniyu i istine, tot sbilsya s pryamogo puti
